attributes.action: Protect our children from the horror that the children at lydd primary school had to endure due to the murder of marcus the school pet sheep
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Marcus, the school pet sheep, was raised by the children at Lydd Primary School  for 3 yrs letting the kids help with its up keep and even naming it then taking it to the slaughter house to use the meat in a school raffle. We want to stop this from happening to other schools, as unfortunately it is too late for marcus the sheep and the heartbroken children at Lydd Primary School.
attributes.creator_name: Trudy Dixon, Zoe Collyer, Jordan Campbell

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.  Your request should be for a specific action, for example "ban animals in schools".
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
